name: csv2xls
tagline: csv2xls is a command line utility which converts csv files into one (or  more if splitted) Excel(TM) file(s).
body:
## Description
If you want to generate Excel(TM) files from CSV files noninteractively, this is for you.

### Why?
There exist solutions already. But maybe for some people it is not possible or acceptable to install perl or phyton just for this small program.
On Linux phython and/or perl is often installed already. But on windows not.
This csv2xls can be cross compiled for windows on Linux with mingw.

### Features
* split output in several files, if max line limit exceeded
* set work sheet name of xls output file
* noninteractive -> useful for automated tasks
* builds on Linux and Windows (mingw)

### Limitations
* produces only Excel(TM) 97/2000/XP/2003
* no cell formatting, just plain text
